Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: (Is that luggage... moving???)

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Sir, I believe your...

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: Oh shoot! Bring it to me.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: AND BE CAREFUL.
Speaker.line2: This is the %latest% %prototype% from my business.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: [CLINK! CLANK! POW! BOOM!]

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: [The luggage finally comes to a halt.]

Choices.Choice1: What a skillful method to fix something
Choices.Choice2: What an unconventional way to fix something

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Such a... skillful method to fix something, sir.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: What an... unconventional way to fix something, sir.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Happy
Speaker.line1: Well, a unique product like this requires a unique method of repair.
Speaker.line2: I'm surprised that even someone like YOU can see that.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Happy
Speaker.line1: This bad boy just aced its debut in my first official %business% %meeting.%

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Congratulations, sir.

Choices.Choice2: Ask is that why he travelled to Eastside

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: May I ask who is the keen customer?

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Is that the reason for your trip to Eastside?

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: Use your head, waiter.
Speaker.line2: I travelled all this way, so obviously the buyer must be from Eastside!

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: Why else would I bother coming here?

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: Have you ever been to the Council?

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Never, sir.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: I have, sir.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: I used to work there, sir.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: That is where my meeting was held.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Happy
Speaker.line1: Pretty impressive, huh?
Speaker.line3: that it attracts the interest of the Eastside elite.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Happy
Speaker.line1: You wouldn't be able to imagine how it feels to be invited there.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: Really? Then you would know how great it feels to be there.
Speaker.line2: Even though we were invited for utterly different purposes, obviously.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: That is where my meeting was held.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Happy
Speaker.line1: Pretty impressive, huh?

Speaker.name: Archibald_Happy
Speaker.line1: that it attracts the interest of the Eastside elite.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Oh, really?
Speaker.line2: Could you tell me how you got invited, sir?

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: That sounds very impressive, sir, indeed.
Speaker.line2: No doubt why your business is at the top of the industry.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Happy
Speaker.line1: Huh, how else could it be?
Speaker.line2: I, Sir Archibald Pompington III, the most successful business owner of Westside.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line2: Oh, and I also came here for %another% %big% %client.%

Speaker.name: Archibald_Happy
Speaker.line1: What a successful business trip I've had.

Choices.Choice1: Ask if it was at the Council
Choices.Choice2: Ask if it was another Eastside client

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Another meeting at the Council, sir?

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Another Eastside client, sir?

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: I've already told you too much, stop prying for more!
Speaker.line2: You are a waiter, do your job. Don’t play detective with me.
Speaker.line3: Especially when you couldn’t even do your job right!
